definitions.definition: ( obsolete ) To impose a fine , a forfeit , or a mulct .

( Oxford University slang ) During a meal or as part of a drinking game , to announce some (usually outrageous) deed such that anyone who has done it must drink; similar to I have never ; commonly associated with crewdates ; very similar to fining at Cambridge University .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) To impose a fine , a forfeit , or a mulct .
secondary_definitions: ( Oxford University slang ) During a meal or as part of a drinking game , to announce some (usually outrageous) deed such that anyone who has done it must drink; similar to I have never ; commonly associated with crewdates ; very similar to fining at Cambridge University .

definitions.definition: to shut within a sconce; to imprison.

main_definition: ( obsolete ) to shut within a sconce; to imprison.
